params._amount: Amount of the currency being used for the bid.
params._currencyAddress: Address of currency being used to bid.
params._originContract: Contract address of asset being bid on.
Contract address of the asset pending auction.

params._auctionType: The type of auction being configured.
params._currencyAddress: The currency the auction is being conducted in.
params._lengthOfAuction: The amount of time in seconds that the auction is configured for.
params._originContract: Contract address of the asset being put up for auction.
params._splitAddresses: Addresses to split the sellers commission with.
params._splitRatios: The ratio for the split corresponding to each of the addresses being split with.
params._startingAmount: The reserve price or min bid of an auction.

params._amount: Amount being converted into an auction.
params._currencyAddress: Address of the currency being converted.
params._lengthOfAuction: Number of seconds the auction will last.
params._splitAddresses: Addresses that the sellers take in will be split amongst.
params._splitRatios: Ratios that the take in will be split by.

returns._0: Auction Struct: creatorAddress, creationTime, startingTime, lengthOfAuction, currencyAddress, minimumBid, auctionType, splitRecipients array, and splitRatios array.

bid(address,uint256,address,uint256).notice: Places a bid on a valid auction.

cancelAuction(address,uint256).notice: Cancels a configured Auction that has not started.

configureAuction(bytes32,address,uint256.notice: Configures an Auction for a given asset.

convertOfferToAuction(address,uint256,ad.notice: Converts an offer into a coldie auction.

settleAuction(address,uint256).notice: Settles an auction that has ended.
